headline: How Flat Sales, Higher EPS, and New Organoid Tools At Bio-Techne (TECH) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Bio-Techne Corporation recently reported past second-quarter and six-month results to December 31, 2025, with sales essentially flat year-on-year at about US$295.88 million for the quarter and US$582.43 million for the half, while net income and earnings per share from continuing operations increased modestly and the Board affirmed a quarterly dividend of US$0.08 per share. Alongside the earnings, Bio-Techne expanded its research tools portfolio with launches in synthetic hydrogels for 3D...
